name: ACK Attack
description:
Use WASD to move, the goal is to survive until the end of the song!

Developed in Unity by 4 people telephone style, 2 hours each with no communication.

You are a freshly sent ACK packet, your goal is to acknowledge that you received the music video, but your destination is blocked by interference on the line after having left a particularly dodgy router.

Creators:

Codey Winslow - codeywinslow@gmail.com

Colin Smith - smithcol253@gmail.com

Michael Remley - mikejamesremley@gmail.com
